text: Foloi ta, é keela leʋeni Ɓalake ma, Aɓinoame ná-doun zunui, Kedɛse nui, Nɛfɛtali yooi zu, é ɠɛ ma: «Wɛlɛ, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Izilayɛle ná-GALAGI devei, nii veeʋɛ è ya: ‹Li è zunu waapuugɔ (10.000) laasei sɛʋɛ, Nɛfɛtali ná-bolodai zu, ta Zaɓulɔn ná-bolodai, è lo ti luɠɔ, wo li Taɓɔɔl gizei ma.
